org.eclipse.viatra.transformation.views.core

Class ViewModelRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.viatra.transformation.views.core.ViewModelRule
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContainmentRule, EdgeRule, ItemRule

    public abstract class ViewModelRule
extends java.lang.Object
    Common ancestor for defining rules for the view models. By default all the jobs are NopJobs.
